attributes.action: Reinstate a sense of pride in the British community by taking simple measures such as placeing a Union Flag, and the flag of the country in which the institute is located, visibly on said establishment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a 16 year old student who is tired of living in a pathetic and embarrassing country, where political correctness has been forced upon every citizen of this small but great island nation, which prevents us from expressing our pride and love for our country. All I ask for is a chance to show my feelings for my country, without feeling that I have done something wrong or illegal. It is for this reason that I challenge this government to come up with a good valid reason, that does not relate to finance, why they should not display a Union Flag, and the flag of Northern Ireland, Wales, Scotland or England respectively, in every school, college, university, hospital and other public buildings, so that the people of The United kingdom can feel that they have an identity again.
